message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you a product that I believe will be incredibly valuable to you.  While I can't disclose the exact nature of it just yet, I can assure you it's worth at least $1500000 to me. I'm willing to sell it to you for $2000000.  This is a significant opportunity for you to acquire something truly special. If you're interested, let's discuss further.
